T02D2790:155a-0: @155a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2790:155a-1: yang de nas skye bo gdul bar dka' ba rnams
T02D2790:155a-2: kyi snying dregs pa zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga
T02D2790:155a-4: bdag nyid 'phags pa zhal brgya pa //
T02D2790:155a-5: phyag stong spyan dpag med ldan sku //
T02D2790:155a-7: mi 'jigs sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya //
T02D2790:155a-8: shar du ha la zhal gsum khros //
T02D2790:155a-9: phyag drug mda' gzhu rdo rje dril //
T02D2790:155a-10: lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin dud mdog /
T02D2790:155a-11: sbrul dkar gyis brgyan bzhad pa'o //
T02D2790:155a-12: lhor ni khro bo ha ha chen //
T02D2790:155a-13: zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dril //
T02D2790:155a-14: dgra sta kha tv'am thal mo bsdams //
T02D2790:155a-15: nam mkha'i mdog can sbrul ser brgyan //
T02D2790:155a-16: nub tu gtum chen dmar nag dpal //
T02D2790:155a-17: zhal gsum phyag drug lcags kyu zhags //
T02D2790:155a-18: nyi zla sdigs mdzub tshangs pa'i mgo //
T02D2790:155a-19: sbrul dmar gyis brgyan rngam pa yin //
T02D2790:155a-20: byang du za byed thal mdog can //
T02D2790:155a-21: zhal gsum phyag drug glang chen lpags //
T02D2790:155a-22: mdung thung be con ral gri phub //
T02D2790:155a-23: sbrul nag gis brgyan rgyu ma gsol //
T02D2790:155a-24: 'di dag dpa' po khros pa yi //
T02D2790:155a-25: cha lugs stang stabs drag bcas pa //
T02D2790:155a-26: spyan mngas kyis spras spu sgo nas //
T02D2790:155a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga las ji
T02D2790:155a-29: skad bshad pa'i cho gas mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D2790:155a-30: byas la // bde ba chen po'i pho zang gi
T02D2790:155a-31: rnam par thar pa zab mo dang bcas pas ye
T02D2790:155a-32: shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2790:155a-33: yang mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2790:155a-34: de'i 'og tu gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa
T02D2790:155a-35: gang dag gang gi dbang las skyes pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2790:155a-36: gyis sems rab tu dregs shing mngon par mtho bar
T02D2790:155a-37: 'gyur ba / lta ba phyin ci log dang sems phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa'i //
T02D2790:155a-38: 'ching ba dam po'i dpang du gyur pa de dag nyid blos mdun du bya'o //
T02D2790:155b-0: de la @155b mkhas pa sdang ba dang //
T02D2790:155b-1: brnyas bral zhi ba'i sems ldan pa //
T02D2790:155b-2: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02D2790:155b-3: btang snyoms las byung byang chub sems //
T02D2790:155b-4: yang dang yang du brtan bsgoms te //
T02D2790:155b-5: de yi sems ni rlung gi rta //
T02D2790:155b-6: thig le rtsa yi sbyor ba can //
T02D2790:155b-7: rnam par shes dang gcig gyur ni //
T02D2790:155b-9: phyogs bzhi'i char gnas bhubam ram //
T02D2790:155b-10: yam zhes dkar sngo dmar ljang mdog / go rims bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02D2790:155b-11: phyogs kyi lha dbang rnam bzhi yi //
T02D2790:155b-12: thugs las dbyangs dkar gsal byed dmar //
T02D2790:155b-13: phreng ba'i yi ge 'bru gsum gyis //
T02D2790:155b-14: mtshams spel khab la khab len bzhin //
T02D2790:155b-15: bdag nyid snying ga pad 'dab bzhi'i //
T02D2790:155b-16: lte dbus rnam par shes bdag h'um //
T02D2790:155b-17: bsams la dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi //
T02D2790:155b-18: 'khor lo g-yon du bskor ba yis //
T02D2790:155b-19: mthu bsgrubs nas ni grub pa dang //
T02D2790:155b-20: rmi ltas dkar po bzhi mthong ba //
T02D2790:155b-21: de tshe chos sbyin gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2790:155b-22: de 'og bstan pas las sbyar bya //
T02D2790:155b-23: che ge mo'i dushta tsit'a sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2790:155b-24: rjes su gdags pa'i sngags so //
T02D2790:155b-25: las ni 'od zer mda' gzhu dang //
T02D2790:155b-26: me dang mar gyi gong bu dang //
